title: 3.24- The September Massacres
itunes:title: 3.24- The September Massacres
description: With the Allied armies approaching Paris, the sans-culottes broke into all the prisoners and slaughtered the inmates.
content:encoded: With the Allied armies approaching Paris, the sans-culottes broke into all the prisoners and slaughtered the inmates.
